name: Rage (itch) (OmegaFalcon)
description:
The less hearts you have, the more powerful you are! The idea was  inspired by the 'rage' mechanic is Super Smash Bros. Can you make it to the end and get 3 stars in every level?

-------------------------------------

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Mouse to aim

Left Click to attack

-------------------------------------

For Blackthornprod's 3rd Game Jame.
